package.name: xdelta
package.unpack: if [ -f ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}3-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 ] ; then tar xjf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}3-${PKGVERSION}.tar.bz2 else tar xJf ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}3-${PKGVERSION}.tar.xz fi
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}3-${PKGVERSION} if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc pump make -j $jobcount pump make -j $jobcount xdelta3 else ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc make make xdelta3 fi
